title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.2 - Medical fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.2 - Medical fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for medical treatment and care rendered
under the Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law shall be the medical fee schedule
in effect under the Workers' Compensation Law of the State of New York
applicable to medical services, as set forth in sections 329.1 through 329.3 of
this Title, on the date on which the medical services were rendered, regardless
of the date of accident. This medical fee schedule is applicable in accordance
with section 329.1 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
401.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
